<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape/switchfieldindex/#aef925686aca6c6970964fea2c25bf242a0416e9f2fbff942bd66bfa6d7e759d47"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/coro/shape/switchfieldindex/#aef925686aca6c6970964fea2c25bf242a0416e9f2fbff942bd66bfa6d7e759d47">Destroy</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The promise field is always at a fixed offset from the start of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frame given its type, but the index isn&#39;t a constant for all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// possible frames.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The switch-index field isn&#39;t at a fixed offset or index, either;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we just work it in where it fits best.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
